message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. It comes with a wide range of features that we believe will significantly enhance your experience. Given its quality and functionality, I propose a price of $200 for this exceptional item. Let me know if you're interested in discussing further or making an offer.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the product's features, $200 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $150 for it.  Let me know if that works for you.
